entity.name: Betsy DeVos
entity.description: US Secretary of Education Betsy DeVos

text: @TIME DeVos directing tax dollars to private schools should be illegal.  Private schools are businesses.  Public schools should be provided coronavirus aid first and foremost.  I can't wait for this self serving concerned for rich pals to be gone.
